import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import DropDown from '../DropDown' import ToggleSlider from '../ToggleSlider' import LineChartContainer from './LineChart' import '../../styles/charts.css' import axios from 'axios' export default function Zugangsdichte() { const [post, setPost] = useState({}); const [id, setId] = useState(1); const [idFromButtonClick, setIdFromButtonClick] = useState(1); const handleClick = () => { setIdFromButtonClick(id) } useEffect(() =>{ axios.get(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/${idFromButtonClick}`) .then(res => { console.log(res); setPost(res.data) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }, [idFromButtonClick]) return (
setId(e.target.value)} />
{post.title}
